channel.title: Noobyest thing and un-noobyest sum1 reported u 4
channel.description:
the noobyest thing sum1 reported me 4 was for saying shut up, that wud probly offend him if he was a japanize binbag (literaly).
the least noobyest wud b, erm... swearing at a mod on the fastest speed with my auto typer so it avoided the filter lol. post soon plz.

item.title: Noobyest thing and un-noobyest sum1 reported u 4
item.dc:creator: @sam_cm sam cm
item.description:
@sam_cm wrote:

[quote=“boberick, post:30, topic:10025”][quote author=5c1mmy link=topic=14549.msg169332#msg169332 date=1156048513]
omg bob that was freaking nasty you dumbass lol :eek:
[/quote]
i told u not to look on it, im deleting that link now, i fell 4 it so sum1 els had 2, that how myt baaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaasdffffffff, sry im FUCKING PISSED OFF COZ IM FUCKING PISSED OFF FFS AND IM GETING PISSED OF STOP LAFIN AT MY FUCKING DISLEXIA AND DISPRAXIA YOU MOTHER FUCKING ASS RAPER!!!
o sry but i cant get the new deobfuscater FUCKING HELL YOU TWAT! coz of ermmmmmmmmmm
i offended popcorn wot. no. not fucking typing any more…
lmfao that kilin a noob then alchin his addy made me piss myself (not literaly duh) and 1 noob re, fuck ive forgoten it already ill remember it wen my problems decide 2 LEAVE ME ALONE FOR FUCKS SAKE!
ok im deleting that prank thing link, (it scared me SHITTLESS!)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 06:34:38 AM[/size][hr]wtf i used 2 hav 3 stars???
must hav been coz of my pranks lol[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 06:40:23 AM[/size][hr]i report mods for jagex staff impersonation wen im bored lol (on another account, u dnt wana no wot hapend with my main)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 06:41:42 AM[/size][hr]btw its been veiwed 261 times, post sumthing ffs!!![/quote]

Nothing like quad-posting lol

noobiest- saying go away to a guy that was foloing me and he reported me

un-noobiest- said F^%* at a drop party with 3 p mods and 1 jagex mods on a lvl 15 pure, banned straight away lol

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:24, topic:10025”][quote author=haruki link=topic=14549.msg186393#msg186393 date=1156630774]
i got reported for typing to fast…WITHOUT AN AUTO TYPER!!!
[/quote]
me 2 in edgeville… i said buying full rune… and i can type that like 1 full line per second…
their was a mod their as well, everyone started saying omfg noob auto typed, and the mod said hey people can type that fast you know, leave him alone.[/quote]
Wow, a mod sticking up for you? What was his name? Do you remember?

[quote=“Zach1188, post:21, topic:10025”][quote author=zoss0 link=topic=14549.msg185286#msg185286 date=1156582798]
Well, let’s see the noobest thing a noob has reported me for was probably beacuse I didn’t give him “Free Stuff” XD
[/quote]
Dude what the hell. That made me spit soda all over my computer screen :D[/quote]
LOLOLOLOLOL THAT MADE ME FALL OFF MY CHAIR!! PAhahahahahaHAHAH!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Hyjall, post:12, topic:10025”][quote author=Number link=topic=14549.msg177660#msg177660 date=1156326971]
I got reported for chopping away at Yews. Jagex laughed and locked the other dumbass’s account. lawl.
[/quote]

Some people don’t think about the word “Sarcasm”
I think any Sentence with Lol/lol (etc) at the beginning and start or any combo or any type of that kinda shiz is sarcasm.
From Number’s sig

I take that’s sarcasm then?[/quote]
OMFG… you cannot use sarcasm on the internet unless you use sarc tabs… see
[sarc] omgwtfbbq roonscape is úber coolio [\sarc]
ive tried many a time to use sarcasm without the tabs and it doesnt get through to people.

Read full topic

lol a long time ago in classic i think, my first account got banned for telling a friend my freewebs account, and yahoo screen name. And recently I randomly logged in on my pure and just said to my friend “well, jagex is gay so im gonna go play on a private server”. Banned within a day lol. but on that same pure i was already warned once when a guy said “why are you using a black sword” and i replied “your mom is black”

runescape kiddies are too emotional.
